full_summary:
===============

### **Contract Notice: Relenza**

#### **Tender Reference:** WS4619110002

The Government of Canada has issued an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of Relenza, under the solicitation number WS4619110002.

#### **Procurement Details:**

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
*   **Notice Type:** Excluded from Competitive Selection (exclusive rights)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 2, 2024
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### **Purchasing Details:**

*   **Regions of Delivery:** Manitoba, Northwest Territories, Saskatchewan, Prince Edward Island, New Brunswick
*   **Trade Agreements:** Various, including NAFTA, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19910372?extsite=MTk5MTAzNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19910372?extsite=MTk5MTAzNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### **Contract Contact Info:**

*   **Contact Person:** Joy, Sharon (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

This ACAN follows the contract award process, and hence, only the contractor holding exclusive rights to provide Relenza is eligible for award.

#### **Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2024, 14:00:00 Hours [EDT]

### **Please note:** The government contract notice expires on June 20, 2024. All inquiries must be made directly to the contracting officer. Ineligible contractors will not be contacted for this announcement. 

### If you have any more questions or want to inquire more details about this notice, please reach out to me.
